definition: to live or die/to exist or perish
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
a make-or-break matter/a matter of life and death

sentences.english: The efficiency of searching is the key problem of an E-journal Website.
sentences.chinese: 检索效率是关系到电子期刊网站生死存亡的一处问题。

sentences.english: The improvement of the work style of the party in power means its life and death.
sentences.chinese: ⑴执政党的党风建设关系到它的生死存亡。

sentences.english: The question before the house is one of awful moment to this country.
sentences.chinese: 摆在全体代表面前的是关系我国危急存亡的重大问题。

sentences.english: It's make-or-break time for the local theatre.
sentences.chinese: 这是当地剧院存亡攸关的时刻。

sentences.english: At this critical moment, it is more important than ever that you remain calm.
sentences.chinese: 现在到了存亡绝续的时候，你更应该保持镇静。

sentences.english: Two, endangering the state’s existence by making common cause with jihadism.
sentences.chinese: 第二，与圣战主义共谋危及国家的存亡。

sentences.english: This paper explored that after getting into market, the coal machinery enterprises will face the choice of rising or falling.
sentences.chinese: 阐述煤机企业走向市场后，面临兴衰存亡的选择。

sentences.english: We should acclaim and support the declaration of the local authorities of northern China that they will defend the homeland to the death.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该赞扬和拥护华北当局与国土共存亡的宣言。

sentences.english: Morrie would walk that final bridge between life and death, and narrate the trip.
sentences.chinese: 莫里将走过存亡间的最终桥梁，并讲述这路程。

sentences.english: Is it a life-or-death issue in this country?
sentences.chinese: 这在这个国家里是生死存亡的问题吗？

sentences.english: Anti-corruption is related to the party and the country's survival.
sentences.chinese: 反腐败关系党和国家的生死存亡。

sentences.english: Great crises often call forth gifted leaders.
sentences.chinese: 危急存亡之际常能产生天才的领袖。

sentences.english: This is a matter of life and death-a matter no country can afford to ignore.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个关系到存亡的问题，任何国度都不能轻忽。

sentences.english: Microsoft is facing an existential threat, says Mr. Evans.
sentences.chinese: 伊万斯说，微软面临着一种关系其生死存亡的威胁。

sentences.english: Attending to drug control as a vital matter involving the rise and fall of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 把禁毒作为事关中华民族兴衰存亡的大事来抓。

definition: to flourish and decay/rise and fall
to concern/on (some topic)/about/concerning/to have importance for
prosperity and decline (of a kingdom)/rise and fall
to share the same interests (idiom)/to be closely related/to be in the same boat
state/country/the Gods of earth and grain
